NotFound.sorry: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

Join.useIpBelow: Use the IP below to join the server:
Join.joinToGetRewards: Join the server to get your rewards!

Store.description: Here you can buy coins, ranks and more for the {server_name} Minecraft server! Start by browing our list of categories, pickout something you like and click on it to view the products. Add the items to your basket and checkout when you're ready. If you have any questions, please join our Discord server.
Store.paymentMethodsTitle: What payment methods do you accept?
Store.paymentMethods: We accept a variety of payment methods, including PayPal, credit cards, and more.
Store.joinDiscordForHelp: Join our Discord server for help with your purchase.

Completed.useButtonToReturn: Use the button below to go back to the store

Vote.toEarnRewards: To earn rewards, you must vote for {server_name} on the following websites:
Vote.step1: Click on the voting link above.
Vote.step2: Enter your username and click on the vote button.
Vote.step3: Wait for the confirmation message in-game for your vote to be registered.
Vote.yourVoteHelps: Your vote helps to grow the server and community. Thank you for your support! You will receive your rewards in-game shortly after voting.

Rules.title: Rules
Rules.description: Please read and follow all rules to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience for everyone.
Rules.joinToGetRewards: Join the server to get your rewards!
Rules.noCheatingDesc: Any use of unauthorised modifications, hacks, or exploits is strictly prohibited.
Rules.respectOthersDesc: Treat all players and staff with respect. Harassment, discrimination, or hate speech will not be tolerated.
Rules.noGriefingDesc: Do not destroy, steal, or alter another player's builds or belongings without permission.
Rules.noAdvertisingDesc: Advertising other servers or services is not allowed.
Rules.keepChatAppropriateDesc: Avoid spamming, excessive swearing, or inappropriate content in chat.
Rules.followDiscordTosDesc: All members must adhere to Discord's Terms of Service and Community Guidelines.
Rules.noSpammingDesc: Avoid sending repeated messages, emojis, or links.
Rules.respectPrivacyDesc: Do not share personal information of yourself or others.
Rules.noNsfwContentDesc: Sharing NSFW or inappropriate content is strictly forbidden.
Rules.useChannelsProperlyDesc: Keep discussions relevant to the channel topics.

Blog.discover: Discover the latest news, updates, and stories from our community.
Blog.joinDiscordHelp: Join our Discord server for help with your purchase.
Blog.askTeam: Head over to our Discord server and ask our team for help.
Blog.exploreTopPosts: Explore some of our top posts, specially curated for you! Have a look and share your thoughts.
